00062 #ifndef _BZLIB_H
00063 #define _BZLIB_H
00064 
00065 #ifdef __cplusplus
00066 extern "C"
00067 {
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #define BZ_RUN               0
00071 #define BZ_FLUSH             1
00072 #define BZ_FINISH            2
00073 
00074 #define BZ_OK                0
00075 #define BZ_RUN_OK            1
00076 #define BZ_FLUSH_OK          2
00077 #define BZ_FINISH_OK         3
00078 #define BZ_STREAM_END        4
00079 #define BZ_SEQUENCE_ERROR    (-1)
00080 #define BZ_PARAM_ERROR       (-2)
00081 #define BZ_MEM_ERROR         (-3)
00082 #define BZ_DATA_ERROR        (-4)
00083 #define BZ_DATA_ERROR_MAGIC  (-5)
00084 #define BZ_IO_ERROR          (-6)
00085 #define BZ_UNEXPECTED_EOF    (-7)
00086 #define BZ_OUTBUFF_FULL      (-8)
00087 #define BZ_CONFIG_ERROR      (-9)
00088 
00089     typedef struct
00090     {
00091         char *next_in;
00092         unsigned int avail_in;
00093         unsigned int total_in_lo32;
00094         unsigned int total_in_hi32;
00095 
00096         char *next_out;
00097         unsigned int avail_out;
00098         unsigned int total_out_lo32;
00099         unsigned int total_out_hi32;
00100 
00101         void *state;
00102 
00103         void *( *bzalloc ) ( void *, int, int );
00104         void ( *bzfree ) ( void *, void * );
00105         void *opaque;
00106     }
00107     bz_stream;
00108 
00109 
00110 #ifndef BZ_IMPORT
00111 #define BZ_EXPORT
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 #ifndef BZ_NO_STDIO
00115 /* Need a definitition for FILE */
00116 #include <stdio.h>
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #ifdef _WIN32
00120 #   include <windows.h>
00121 #   ifdef small
00122     /*
00123      * windows.h define small to char 
00124      */
00125 #      undef small
00126 #   endif
00127 #   ifdef BZ_EXPORT
00128 #   define BZ_API(func) WINAPI func
00129 #   define BZ_EXTERN extern
00130 #   else
00131     /*
00132      * import windows dll dynamically 
00133      */
00134 #   define BZ_API(func) (WINAPI * func)
00135 #   define BZ_EXTERN
00136 #   endif
00137 #else
00138 #   define BZ_API(func) func
00139 #   define BZ_EXTERN extern
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 
00143 /*-- Core (low-level) library functions --*/
00144 
00145     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzCompressInit ) ( bz_stream * strm, int blockSize100k, int verbosity, int workFactor );
00146 
00147     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzCompress ) ( bz_stream * strm, int action );
00148 
00149     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzCompressEnd ) ( bz_stream * strm );
00150 
00151     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzDecompressInit ) ( bz_stream * strm, int verbosity, int small );
00152 
00153     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzDecompress ) ( bz_stream * strm );
00154 
00155     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzDecompressEnd ) ( bz_stream * strm );
00156

00162 #define BZ_MAX_UNUSED 5000
00163 
00164     typedef void BZFILE;
00165 
00166     BZ_EXTERN BZFILE *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzReadOpen ) ( int *bzerror, FILE * f, int verbosity, int small, void *unused, int nUnused );
00167 
00168     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzReadClose ) ( int *bzerror, BZFILE * b );
00169 
00170     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzReadGetUnused ) ( int *bzerror, BZFILE * b, void **unused, int *nUnused );
00171 
00172     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzRead ) ( int *bzerror, BZFILE * b, void *buf, int len );
00173 
00174     BZ_EXTERN BZFILE *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzWriteOpen ) ( int *bzerror, FILE * f, int blockSize100k, int verbosity, int workFactor );
00175 
00176     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzWrite ) ( int *bzerror, BZFILE * b, void *buf, int len );
00177 
00178     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzWriteClose ) ( int *bzerror, BZFILE * b, int abandon, unsigned int *nbytes_in, unsigned int *nbytes_out );
00179 
00180     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzWriteClose64 ) ( int *bzerror,
00181                                                    BZFILE * b, int abandon, unsigned int *nbytes_in_lo32, unsigned int *nbytes_in_hi32, unsigned int *nbytes_out_lo32, unsigned int *nbytes_out_hi32 );
00182 #endif

00188 
00189     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzBuffToBuffDecompress ) ( char *dest, unsigned int *destLen, char *source, unsigned int sourceLen, int small, int verbosity );

00192 /*--
00193    Code contributed by Yoshioka Tsuneo
00194    (QWF00133@niftyserve.or.jp/tsuneo-y@is.aist-nara.ac.jp),
00195    to support better zlib compatibility.
00196    This code is not _officially_ part of libbzip2 (yet);
00197    I haven't tested it, documented it, or considered the
00198    threading-safeness of it.
00199    If this code breaks, please contact both Yoshioka and me.
00200 --*/
00201 
00202     BZ_EXTERN const char *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzlibVersion ) ( void );
00203 
00204 #ifndef BZ_NO_STDIO
00205     BZ_EXTERN BZFILE *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzopen ) ( const char *path, const char *mode );
00206 
00207     BZ_EXTERN BZFILE *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzdopen ) ( int fd, const char *mode );
00208 
00209     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzread ) ( BZFILE * b, void *buf, int len );
00210 
00211     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzwrite ) ( BZFILE * b, void *buf, int len );
00212 
00213     BZ_EXTERN int BZ_API ( BZ2_bzflush ) ( BZFILE * b );
00214 
00215     BZ_EXTERN void BZ_API ( BZ2_bzclose ) ( BZFILE * b );
00216 
00217     BZ_EXTERN const char *BZ_API ( BZ2_bzerror ) ( BZFILE * b, int *errnum );
00218 #endif

00220 #ifdef __cplusplus
00221 }
